we get, with

,

Math.tex: \begin{split}&\displaystyle\Gamma(t,x)\cdot\psi(\widehat{f})(-1/t,-x/t)\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\Gamma(t,x)\cdot\int_{\mathbb{R}}\widehat{f}(y)% \Gamma\left(-\frac{1}{t},-\frac{x}{t}-y\right)dy\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\Gamma(t,x)\cdot\int_{\mathbb{R}}\widehat{f}\left(% -\frac{x}{t}-y\right)\Gamma\left(-\frac{1}{t},y\right)dy\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\sqrt{\frac{i}{t}}e^{-\pi ix^{2}/t}\cdot\int_{% \mathbb{R}}\left(\int_{\mathbb{R}}f(u)e^{-2\pi iu\left(-\frac{x}{t}-y\right)}% du\right)\cdot\sqrt{-it}e^{\pi ity^{2}}dy\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle e^{-\pi ix^{2}/t}\int_{\mathbb{R}}f(u)e^{2\pi iux% /t}\left(\int_{\mathbb{R}}e^{2\pi iuy+\pi ity^{2}}dy\right)du\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle e^{-\pi ix^{2}/t}\int_{\mathbb{R}}f(u)e^{2\pi iux% /t}\cdot\sqrt{\frac{2\pi i}{2\pi t}}\exp\left(-\frac{i}{4\pi t}(2\pi u)^{2}% \right)du\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle e^{-\pi ix^{2}/t}\sqrt{\frac{i}{t}}\int_{\mathbb{% R}}f(u)e^{2\pi iux/t}\exp\left(-\frac{\pi iu^{2}}{t}\right)du\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\sqrt{\frac{i}{t}}\int_{\mathbb{R}}f(u)\exp\left(-% \frac{\pi ix^{2}}{t}+\frac{2\pi iux}{t}-\frac{\pi iu^{2}}{t}\right)du\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\sqrt{\frac{i}{t}}\int_{\mathbb{R}}f(u)e^{-\frac{% \pi i(x-u)^{2}}{t}}du\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\int_{\mathbb{R}}f(u)\Gamma(t,x-u)du\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\psi(f)(t,x).\end{split}
Math.text: ((Gamma * open-interval@(t, x)) cdot psi) * widehat@(f) * open-interval@(- 1 / t, - x / t) = (Gamma * open-interval@(t, x)) cdot (integral _ R)@(widehat@(f) * y * Gamma * open-interval@(- 1 / t, - x / t - y) * differential-d@(y)) = (Gamma * open-interval@(t, x)) cdot (integral _ R)@(widehat@(f) * (- x / t - y) * Gamma * open-interval@(- 1 / t, y) * differential-d@(y)) = (square-root@(i / t) * e ^ (- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t)) cdot (integral _ R)@(((integral _ R)@(f * u * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * u * (- x / t - y)) * differential-d@(u)) cdot square-root@(- i * t)) * e ^ (pi * i * t * y ^ 2) * differential-d@(y)) = e ^ (- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) * (integral _ R)@(f * u * e ^ ((2 * pi * i * u * x) / t) * (integral _ R)@(e ^ (2 * pi * i * u * y + pi * i * t * y ^ 2) * differential-d@(y)) * differential-d@(u)) = e ^ (- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) * (integral _ R)@(((f * u * e ^ ((2 * pi * i * u * x) / t)) cdot square-root@((2 * pi * i) / (2 * pi * t))) * exponential@(- (i / (4 * pi * t)) * (2 * pi * u) ^ 2) * differential-d@(u)) = e ^ (- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) * square-root@(i / t) * (integral _ R)@(f * u * e ^ ((2 * pi * i * u * x) / t) * exponential@(- (pi * i * u ^ 2) / t) * differential-d@(u)) = square-root@(i / t) * (integral _ R)@(f * u * exponential@(((- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) + (2 * pi * i * u * x) / t) - (pi * i * u ^ 2) / t) * differential-d@(u)) = square-root@(i / t) * (integral _ R)@(f * u * e ^ (- (pi * i * (x - u) ^ 2) / t) * differential-d@(u)) = (integral _ R)@(f * u * Gamma * open-interval@(t, x - u) * differential-d@(u)) = psi * f * open-interval@(t, x)
psi * f * open-interval@(t, x) = ((Gamma * open-interval@(t, x)) cdot psi) * widehat@(f) * open-interval@(- 1 / t, - x / t)
psi * f * open-interval@(t, x)
absent = ((Gamma * open-interval@(t, x)) cdot psi) * widehat@(f) * open-interval@(- 1 / t, - x / t)

absent = (square-root@(i / t) * e ^ (- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t)) cdot (integral _ R)@(((widehat@(f) * xi) cdot square-root@(- i * t)) * exponential@(pi * i * t * (- x / t - xi) ^ 2) * differential-d@(xi))

absent = (square-root@(i / t) * e ^ (- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t)) cdot (integral _ R)@(((widehat@(f) * xi) cdot square-root@(- i * t)) * exponential@(pi * i * t * (- x / t - xi) ^ 2) * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ R)@(widehat@(f) * xi * exponential@((- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) + (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t + 2 * pi * i * x * xi + pi * i * t * xi ^ 2) * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ R)@(widehat@(f) * xi * exponential@((- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) + (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t + 2 * pi * i * x * xi + pi * i * t * xi ^ 2) * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ R)@(widehat@(f) * xi * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * xi + pi * i * t * xi ^ 2) * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ R)@(widehat@(f) * xi * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * xi + pi * i * t * xi ^ 2) * differential-d@(xi))

para.p:
Given
t
and
x
, let
=
⁢ γ
( y )
⁢ Γ
( t ,
- x y
)
. We calculate

Math.text: widehat@(gamma) * xi = (integral _ R)@(gamma * y * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * xi * y) * differential-d@(y))
widehat@(gamma) * xi
absent = (integral _ R)@(gamma * y * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * xi * y) * differential-d@(y))
absent = (integral _ R)@(square-root@(i / t) * e ^ (- (pi * i * (x - y) ^ 2) / t) * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * xi * y) * differential-d@(y))
absent = (integral _ R)@(square-root@(i / t) * e ^ (- (pi * i * (x - y) ^ 2) / t) * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * xi * y) * differential-d@(y))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\int_{\mathbb{R}}\sqrt{\frac{i}{t}}\exp\left(-\frac{\pi ix^{2}}{% t}+\frac{2\pi ixy}{t}-\frac{\pi iy^{2}}{t}-2\pi i\xi y\right)dy.
Math.text: absent = (integral _ R)@(square-root@(i / t) * exponential@(((- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) + (2 * pi * i * x * y) / t) - (pi * i * y ^ 2) / t - 2 * pi * i * xi * y) * differential-d@(y))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\int_{\mathbb{R}}\sqrt{\frac{i}{t}}\exp\left(-\frac{\pi ix^{2}}{% t}+\frac{2\pi ixy}{t}-\frac{\pi iy^{2}}{t}-2\pi i\xi y\right)dy.
Math.text: absent = (integral _ R)@(square-root@(i / t) * exponential@(((- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) + (2 * pi * i * x * y) / t) - (pi * i * y ^ 2) / t - 2 * pi * i * xi * y) * differential-d@(y))
(integral _ R)@(exponential@((1 / 2) * i * a * w ^ 2 + i * J * w) * differential-d@(w)) = square-root@((2 * pi * i) / a) * exponential@(- (i * J ^ 2) / (2 * a))

para.p:
with
= a
-
⁢ 2 π
t
and
= J
-
⁢ 2 π x
t
⁢ 2 π ξ
, for which
=
J 2
+
-
⁢ 4
π 2
x 2
t 2
⁢ 8
π 2
x ξ
t
⁢ 4
π 2
ξ 2
,

Math.text: widehat@(gamma) * xi = ((square-root@(i / t) * exponential@(- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t)) cdot square-root@(- i * t)) * exponential@(((i * t) / (4 * pi)) * J ^ 2)
widehat@(gamma) * xi
absent = ((square-root@(i / t) * exponential@(- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t)) cdot square-root@(- i * t)) * exponential@(((i * t) / (4 * pi)) * J ^ 2)
absent = exponential@(- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) * exponential@(((i * pi * x ^ 2) / t - 2 * pi * i * x * xi) + pi * i * xi ^ 2 * t)
absent = exponential@(- (pi * i * x ^ 2) / t) * exponential@(((i * pi * x ^ 2) / t - 2 * pi * i * x * xi) + pi * i * xi ^ 2 * t)
absent = exponential@((- 2 * pi * i * x * xi) + pi * i * xi ^ 2 * t)
absent = exponential@((- 2 * pi * i * x * xi) + pi * i * xi ^ 2 * t)

para.p: The Poisson summation formula tells us

Math.text: (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(gamma * n) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(widehat@(gamma) * n)

(sum _ (n element-of Z))@(Gamma * open-interval@(t, x - n)) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ ((- 2 * pi * i * n * x) + pi * i * t * n ^ 2)) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (2 * pi * i * n * x + pi * i * t * n ^ 2))

Theta * open-interval@(t, x) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * (t * n ^ 2 + 2 * x * n))) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * n)) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(Gamma * open-interval@(t, x - n))

para.p:
For
∈ ϕ S
, namely a Schwartz function, define

Math.text: Theta _ t * phi * x = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@((integral _ R)@(phi * x * e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * n) * differential-d@(x)))
Theta _ t * phi * x = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(widehat@(phi) * (- n) * e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2)) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(widehat@(phi) * n * e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2))

para.p:
If
f
is
1
-periodic, for
∈ n Z
let

Math.text: widehat@(f) * n = ((integral _ 0) ^ 1)@(f * y * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * n * y) * differential-d@(y))
psi * f * open-interval@(t, x) = Theta _ t * f * x = ((integral _ 0) ^ 1)@(Theta * open-interval@(t, x - y) * f * y * differential-d@(y))
psi * f * open-interval@(t, x) = ((integral _ 0) ^ 1)@((sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * (x - y) * n) * f * y * d * y))
psi * f * open-interval@(t, x)
absent = ((integral _ 0) ^ 1)@((sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * (x - y) * n) * f * y * d * y))
absent = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * n) * ((integral _ 0) ^ 1)@(f * y * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * n * y) * differential-d@(y)))
absent = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * n) * ((integral _ 0) ^ 1)@(f * y * e ^ (- 2 * pi * i * n * y) * differential-d@(y)))
absent = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * n) * widehat@(f) * n)
absent = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * n) * widehat@(f) * n)
Theta * open-interval@(t, x) = Theta _ t * x = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2) * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x * n))
(widehat@(Theta)) _ t * n = e ^ (pi * i * t * n ^ 2)

para.p:
Say
= t
⁢ 2 M
N
. Then for
∈ k Z
,

Math.text: (widehat@(Theta)) _ t * (k + N) = exponential@((pi * i) cdot ((2 * M) / N) cdot (k + N) ^ 2)
(widehat@(Theta)) _ t * (k + N)
absent = exponential@((pi * i) cdot ((2 * M) / N) cdot (k + N) ^ 2)
absent = exponential@((pi * i) cdot ((2 * M) / N) cdot k ^ 2)
absent = exponential@((pi * i) cdot ((2 * M) / N) cdot k ^ 2)
